full_name: Fraction Reads in Squares Under Tissue
alert_warn_detail: Ideal > 75%. Application performance may be affected. Many of the reads were not assigned to tissue covered squares. This could be caused by high levels of ambient RNA resulting from inefficient permeabilization, because the incorrect image was used, or because of poor tissue detection. The latter case can be addressed by using the manual tissue selection option through Loupe. Ignore this alert if you manually selected a subset of the tissue in the capture area, such as a single core punch in a TMA.
alert_warn_name: Low Fraction Gene Expression Reads in Squares
help_description: The fraction of valid-barcode, confidently-mapped-to-probe-set reads with tissue-associated barcodes.

full_name: Valid Barcodes
alert_warn_detail: Ideal > 70%. This may indicate a quality issue with the R1 read for the Visium Chemistry. Application performance may be affected.
help_description: Fraction of reads with barcodes that match the whitelist after barcode correction.

full_name: Estimated UMIs from Genomic DNA
alert_warn_detail: Ideal < 20%. High gDNA levels were detected. Confirm that workflow was performed correctly and check tissue block quality.
help_description: The estimated fraction of filtered UMIs derived from genomic DNA based on the discordance between probes targeting exon-junction-spanning regions and non-exon-junction-spanning regions.

full_name: Q30 Bases in Barcode
alert_warn_detail: Fraction of cell barcode bases (Illumina I7 Read for Single Cell 3' v1, R1 for Single Cell 3' v2/v3 and Single Cell 5') with Q-score >= 30 should be above 55%. A lower fraction might indicate poor sequencing quality.
alert_warn_name: Fraction of cell barcode bases with Q-score >= 30 is low
help_description: Fraction of cell barcode bases with Q-score >= 30, excluding very low quality/no-call (Q <= 2) bases from the denominator.

full_name: Genes Detected
help_description: The number of unique genes from the filtered probe set with at least one UMI count in any tissue covered square.

full_name: Sequencing Saturation
help_description: The fraction of reads originating from an already-observed UMI. This is a function of library complexity and sequencing depth. More specifically, this is the fraction of confidently mapped, valid square-barcode, valid UMI reads that had a non-unique square-barcode/UMI/gene combination.

full_name: Number of Squares Under Tissue 2 µm
help_description: Number of 2µm squares coverd by tissue.

full_name: Mean Reads Under Tissue per Square 2 µm
help_description: Mean reads per 2µm square covered by tissue.

full_name: Fraction of Squares Under Tissue 2 µm
help_description: Fraction of 2µm squares covered by tissue.

full_name: Mean Genes Under Tissue per Square 2 µm
help_description: Median genes detected per 2µm square covered by tissue.

full_name: Mean UMIs Under Tissue per Square 2 µm
help_description: Mean UMIs detected per 2µm square covered by tissue.

full_name: Total Genes Detected Under Tissue 2 µm
help_description: Total genes detected across 2µm square capture area covered by tissue.

full_name: Number of Bins Under Tissue 8 µm
help_description: Number of 8 µm bins coverd by tissue.

full_name: Mean Reads Under Tissue per Bin 8 µm
help_description: Mean reads per 8 µm bins covered by tissue.

full_name: Fraction of Bins Under Tissue 8 µm
help_description: Fraction of 8 µm bins covered by tissue.

full_name: Mean Genes Under Tissue per Bin 8 µm
help_description: Median genes detected per 8 µm bins covered by tissue.

full_name: Mean UMIs Under Tissue per Bin 8 µm
help_description: Mean UMIs detected per 8 µm bins covered by tissue.

full_name: Total Genes Detected Under Tissue 8 µm
help_description: Total genes detected across 8 µm bins capture area covered by tissue.

full_name: Number of Bins Under Tissue 16 µm
help_description: Number of 16µm bins coverd by tissue.

full_name: Mean Reads Under Tissue per Bin 16 µm
help_description: Mean reads per 16µm bins covered by tissue.

full_name: Fraction of Bins Under Tissue 16 µm
help_description: Fraction of 16µm bins covered by tissue.

full_name: Mean Genes Under Tissue per Bin 16 µm
help_description: Median genes detected per 16µm bins covered by tissue.

full_name: Mean UMIs Under Tissue per Bin 16 µm
help_description: Mean UMIs detected per 16µm bins covered by tissue.

full_name: Total Genes Detected Under Tissue 16 µm
help_description: Total genes detected across 16µm bins capture area covered by tissue.

key: # Things to take out from the SD Visium

full_name: Number of Squares Under Tissue
alert_warn_detail: Ideal >20. This usually indicates poor tissue detection, poor library quality, or poor sequencing quality. Application performance is likely to be affected.
alert_warn_detail_cs: Ideal > 20. This usually indicates poor tissue detection, poor library quality, or poor sequencing quality. Application performance is likely to be affected.
help_description: The number of barcodes associated with a square under tissue.

full_name: Mean Reads per Square
help_description: The number of reads, both under and outside of tissue, divided by the number of barcodes associated with a square under tissue.

full_name: Mean Reads per Square
help_description: The number of reads, both under and outside of tissue, divided by the number of barcodes associated with a square under tissue.

full_name: Fraction of Squares Under Tissue
help_description: The fraction of the squares under the tissue.

full_name: Mean Reads Under Tissue per Square
alert_warn_detail: Modifying the parameter --rps-limit is not recommended. Please refer to the documentation.
alert_warn_name: High Reads Under Tissue per Square
help_description: The number of reads under tissue divided by the number of barcodes associated with a square under tissue.

full_name: Median Genes per Square
help_description: The median number of genes detected per square under tissue-associated barcode. Detection is defined as the presence of at least 1 UMI count.

full_name: Median UMI Counts per Square
help_description: The median number of UMI counts per tissue covered square.

full_name: Median Genes per Square
help_description: The median number of genes detected per square under tissue-associated barcode. Detection is defined as the presence of at least 1 UMI count.

full_name: Median UMI Counts per Square
help_description: The median number of targeted UMI counts per tissue-associated barcode.

full_name: Number of Genes >= 10 UMIs
help_description: Number of genes with at least 10 filtered UMIs from tissue-associated barcodes. These genes are used to calculate per-gene enrichments.
